attributes.action:
Make Captain Tom Moore a “Sir”
99 years old a worthy honour to be “Sir Tom
attributes.additional_details: It’s fitting for the time we are in to recognise people who make a difference and Captain Tom Moore has definitely made a difference to all in the U.K., firstly by serving his country and secondly raising over £12million in serving the community again by raising money for the NHS, the heroes of COVID-19
attributes.background: Honour a captain who continues to serve his country even at the age of 99. Captain Tom Morgan deserves to be nighted as a “Sir” for services rendered

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
